name: Ipad covers grey blue
description:
The Ipad cover fits both the Ipad 1 and 2 snug and safe. With of course accommodating rolling Ipad cover. 
Leather care:
Keep using it! The best thing with leather is that the oil in your hands will lubricate the leather. Sometimes leather will dry out in which case using hide food or wax should do. But I don't expect that to happen for a good few years. If the the product is in high whether conditions a wax or oil is recommended.
What we are using:
The Ipad cover is made with a vegetable tan leather from Italy and is stitched. They are all lined with pigskin on the inside. Mostly contrasting colours.

name: I Pad Cover Brown
description:
This case fits all the Ipad's snug and safe. With of course accommodating rolling Ipad cover. This bag can come with a strap or without.
Keep using it! The best thing with leather is that the oil in your hands will lubricate the leather. Sometimes leather will dry out in which case using hide food or wax should do. But I don't expect that to happen for a good few years. If the the product is in high whether conditions a wax or oil is recommended.
The Ipad cover is made with a vegetable tan leather from Italy and is stitched. They are all lined with pigskin on the inside. Mostly contrasting colours.

name: Cable Tidy
description:
Keep your small cable's tidy!! 
Head phone cable's, Usb Cable's, any Device Cable.
Feed one end into the slot at the back and fold in. can be used on the move at home. 
Lots of colours available please enquire.

name: Initial Embossing
description:
Personalization of Products can be embossed with initials at an extra cost, making it that gift little bit more special. 
Please send us a note via our email with initial letters and to discuss where the initial should be placed. Normally we would stamp them in the bottom left or right corners.

name: Leather Hunting Man Bag
description:
The leather Hunting Bag Is a mans shoulder strap bag that can fit you tablet or Ipad in safe and snug. It has an adjustable strap with two front pockets to keep your everyday things in ( phones and keys). The main pocket is a nice size with the Tablet pocket on the back wall of the product.

Each bag at Wolfram Lohr is individually hand stamped with the date of creation and the bag number.

At Wolfram Lohr we make each product to the highest standard and make sure they are built to last. We do this by selecting high quality leathers and using methods that will stand the test of time.

Leather Care 
The best thing to care for your leather is to use it. The oil in your hands will lubricate the leather. Sometimes the leather will dry out in which case using hide food or wax should do.  If the the product is in high whether conditions a wax or Dubin is recommended.

Materials
Hunting bag is made with a certified vegetable tan leather from Italy and is cut from a pattern then assembled and stitched.

Dimensions
Width: 26 cm Height: 29 cm Depth: 8 cm

name: Ipad Covers Navy blue
description:
This case fits both the Ipad 1 and 2 snug and safe. With of course accommodating rolling Ipad cover. This bag can come with a strap or without.

The best thing with leather is that the oil in your hands will lubricate the leather. Sometimes leather will dry out in which case using hide food or wax should do. But I don't expect that to happen for a good few years. If the the product is in high whether conditions a wax or oil is recommended.

The Ipad cover is made with a vegetable tan leather from Italy and is stitched. They are all lined with pigskin on the inside. Mostly contrasting colours.

Width: 26 cm Height: 20 cm Depth: 1.5 cm

name: Mobile Pocket
description:
This leather mobile pocket is made with a fantastic selection of hides. We have made some with contrasting threads and all with the extra pocket on the front, for tickets or cards. 
it makes for a very handy holder indeed.
It fits all Iphones and smaller.

name: Leather Pencil case small
description:
Our Leather pencil cases are a small size with wholesome leather. Tactile and colourful.

Dont see the colour that you need? Please contact us and can offer other colours.

name: Penny Leather Wallet
description:
This wallet has a change compartment in which the furthest corner is blocked off to allow easy retrieval of coins. This has been made into a feature with a penny sewn into it giving the wallet its name.

There are five staggered card compartments lined with a deep red patterned fabric. The note compartment runs on the back of the wallet. 

This is truly a stylish wallet in three leathers that contrast to enhance the form.

name: Suzie Bag
description:
The Suzie is a smart every day bag, slightly bigger than the Bella strap bag which make this shoulder bag a good medium size. 
It has a handy zip pocket on the outside of the bag and a little pocket on the inside. The main part is assessable with a zip. 
This is for people who want to carry the right amount and a little more.
Made from Italian vegetable tanned leather, this leather lush and deep in every sense of the word.

name: Nancy Bag
description: This leather shoulder bag was originally made as a Ipad cover, now it is made with a gusset, making it look like a neat, retro looking, across the shoulder bag. It has an adjustable strap to add to versatility, it can be used as a large clutch or on the office table. The Nancy bag can fit an Ipad in if needed and a little more. From a lightweight day bag to a night out on the town, this bag is a smart all rounder.

name: Brown Leather Zip Pocket Wallet
description:
The leather zip pocket wallet is a fantastically convenient wallet to fit in your pocket. Perfect present for men. 

This leather wallet has three devisions. It has a coin pocket in the middle of the wallet. On either side of the pocket there is extra space to fit cards notes and receipts.


Dimensions: 11cm x 9.5cm x 1.5cm

Made with vegetable tanned leather from Italy. This is a high quality leather that feels great and gets better over time.

name: Leather Coin Purse
description:
Our Leather Coin Purse is small enough to go the pocket with out too much bulging! 
Zip with leather pulley and stamped label on the inside. This purse is non fussy purse for men and ladies.

6.5 x 7 x 1 cm

name: Tote Bag
description:
This new Tote bag is shoulder and hand bag. Great for chucking things straight in. On shopping trip or a day the beach a great day out bag.
Each bag has a pocket on the inside and comes in different colours. 
Made from Italian vegetable tanned leather, this leather lush in every sense of the word and ages beautifully.

name: Maretta Leather Shoulder Bag
description:
This Leather Shoulder Bag is fully lined with one small pocket on the inside and another useful pocket on the outside.

Dimensions are 35cm x 35cm x 11cm

This Smart bag is big enough for day and work. It comes in various colours.

This Leather is vegetable tanned from Italy and is lined with grey cotton linen mix fabric.

name: The Post Mistress shoulder bag.
description:
The Post mistress is a smart bag, featuring a brass key hole lock at the front and inside is a pencil holder and pocket. 

The strap has a buckle and can be adjusted.

Dimesions width:9cm  lenght:31cm  height: 22cm

options.name: Vintage Lilac with lime green trim and tan pig skin lining.

name: The Mini Post Shoulder strap bag
description:
This bag is modeled in a style of an old Post bag. It is one of the smallest bags in the range. It is made from vegetable tanned leather from Italy. It has a brass key hole lock at the front. Inside is a pencil holder and pocket lined with orange pig skin.
The strap has a buckle and can be adjusted.

Dimensions: 271cm x 21cm x 7cm

It is available in two colours. One is Blue leather and is stitched with orange and has grey pig skin lining. The other colour is Tan leather, Choc pig skin lining with orange stitch.

name: Round Leather Shoulder Bag Chocolate Lining
description:
Ladies' handbag with handle and detachable shoulder strap.

Dimensions: 28cm wide x 14cm high x 14cm deep

This bag has no pockets but its unusual barrel shape means objects inside can be found easily.

Each bag is uniquely numbered and dated with a stamp when it is completed.

Colour combining is one of our strengths and it will be left to Wolfram's discretion. Alternatively please contact us to discuss your leather stitching and lining preferences.

All of our items are made by hand and, in most cases, are made to order. For this reason, the average time for shipping is two to four weeks for bags. If the item(s) is in stock it will generally ship the day after we receive the order. See terms and conditions for more details.

name: Square Ladies Leather Shoulder Bag
description:
Our Square Bag is a classic handbag shape with reinforced sides based on the shape of a shoe sole. This design feature creates a spacious bottom half to the bag.Includes pen holder & inside zip pocket, adjustable strap and a buckle fastening.

Dimensions: 24cm wide x 24cm high x 8.5cm deep

All of our items are made by hand and, in most cases, are made to order. For this reason, the average time for shipping is two to four weeks for bags. If the item(s) is in stock it will generally ship the day after we receive the order. See terms and conditions for more details.

name: Sophie bag
description:
The Sophie bag is our new small shoulder strap bag 

It is a small and smart addition to anyone's wardrobe, it sports an adjustable and detachable strap making it possible to double up as a clutch bag. It has an push button closing system at the front with an inside pocket. 

It comes in vegetable tan leather from Italy. NEW COLOURS COMING SOON!

Each bag at Wolfram Lohr is individually hand stamped with the date of creation and the bag number.

At Wolfram Lohr we make each product to the highest standard and make sure they are built to last. We do this by selecting high quality leathers and using methods that will stand the test of time. 

Dimentions: 
WIdth : 23cm   Height : 17.5cm   Depth : 2.5cm expandable to 5cm

name: Bella Shoulder Strap Bag
description:
This Shoulder Bag has an adjustable strap and is a size for everyday and anywhere. 

Dimensions: 22cm wide x 18cm high x 2cm width

It has an inside pocket and outside zip pocket for handy bits and comes in a few colours.  If there is a colour that you can not see, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Post Satchel
description:
Vintage mid brown Satchel with dark brown trim and pig skin chocolate lining

Smart yet casual, this magazine size bag is built to last with a wide back. It measures: 35cm wide x 22cm high x 9.5cm deep.

It includes a pen holder, inside zip pocket, padded adjustable shoulder strap and keyhole fastening.

Each bag is uniquely numbered and dated with a stamp when it is completed.

Colour combining is one of our strengths and will be left to Wolfram's discretion. Alternatively please contact us to discuss your leather stitching and lining preferences.

name: Leather Laptop Bag
description:
This Laptop Bag is made to order. It comes with a detachable padded strap as to use the handle on its own. Inside it has a pen holder and a detachable divider.
 
Sizing specification can be different so please talk to us to confirm measurements.

Each bag is uniquely numbered and dated with a stamp when it is completed.

name: Floppy Leather Messinger Bag
description:
Our Floppy Bag is made with a bubble brown vegetable tanned leather from Italy and it has green stitching. It comes with mobile phone pocket, pen holder and inside zip pocket. 

A4 size: 34.5cm wide x 27cm high x 7cm deep.

name: Leather Pencil case
description:
Our Leather pencil cases are a small size with wholesome leather. Tactile and colourful. 

Dont see the colour that you need? Please contact us and can offer other colours.

name: Leather A5 Book Cover
description:
Our A5 Leather book covers are reusable and take hard bound cartridge paper books. They are made with vegetable tanned leather from Italy. Inside it contains a pencil holder and a pencil. We produce it in a range of colours.

Height 18cm, Length 23cm, Depth 2.5cm

name: Four Line Stitch Leather Belt
description:
This casual belt leather belt comes in various colours. The stitched line detail makes the belt special and unique.

This leather belt is made from Italian belt leather. It has four stitched lines in graded colours all desending across the belt.

Like all leather products using them gives the best possible care.

Free UK Delivery

All of our belts sizes are: 
XS 70cm-83cm waist 
S 78cm-91cm waist 
M 86cm-100cm waist 
L 95cm-108cm waist 
XL 101cm-115cm waist

Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size.

name: Circle String Belt
description:
This belt is a fun mens and ladies belt. That brings a bit color to any casual look with the leather strings running in between the lining and top leather.
The width of the belt is a 3.8cm which fits all jeans belt loops. Made with our bashed silver buckle.

name: Jeans Leather Belt
description: This unstitched jeans belt is 4.4cm wide with a brass buckle. It comes in three different colours. All of our belts sizes are: XS 70cm-83cm waist S 78cm-91cm waist M 86cm-100cm waist L 95cm-108cm waist XL 101cm-115cm waist Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size. Colours are represented as accurately as possible, but all computer screens display colours differently. Please request samples to confirm where exact colours are needed.

name: Classic Leather Belt
description: This classic belt leather belt is 3.8cm wide with a brass buckle. It comes in two different colours. All of our belts sizes are: XS 70cm-83cm waist S 78cm-91cm waist M 86cm-100cm waist L 95cm-108cm waist XL 101cm-115cm waist Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size. Colours are represented as accurately as possible, but all computer screens display colours differently. Please request samples to confirm where exact colours are needed.

name: Suit Leather Belt
description: This belt's leather comes from Italy. It's stitched and is available in three different colours. It has a 3cm gunmetal buckle and one fixed loop. All of our belts sizes are: XS 70cm-83cm waist S 78cm-91cm waist M 86cm-100cm waist L 95cm-108cm waist XL 101cm-115cm waist Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size. Colours are represented as accurately as possible, but all computer screens display colours differently. Please request samples to confirm where exact colours are needed.

name: Red Leather Belt
description:
Our 3cm Red Belt Leather Belt is made with a brass antique looking roller buckle. The belt leather is from Italy. It's robust and ages to a lovelly deep raspberry red colour. 

All of our belts sizes are: 
XS 70cm-83cm waist 
S 78cm-91cm waist 
M 86cm-100cm waist 
L 95cm-108cm waist 
XL 101cm-115cm waist

Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size.

Colours are represented as accurately as possible, but all computer screens display colours differently. Please request samples to confirm where exact colours are needed.

name: Skinny Zip Belt Red
description:
Our Skinny Zip Belt is made of vegetable tanned leather from Italy. The width of the belt is 2.5 made with a brass buckle.

All of our belts sizes are: 
XS 70cm-83cm waist 
S 78cm-91cm waist 
M 86cm-100cm waist 
L 95cm-108cm waist 
XL 101cm-115cm waist

Please note this is the actual waist measurement not trouser size.

Colours are represented as accurately as possible, but all computer screens display colours differently. Please request samples to confirm where exact colours are needed.

name: Black Leather Zip Pocket Wallet
description:
The leather zip pocket wallet is a fantastically convenient wallet to fit in your pocket. Perfect present for men.
This leather wallet has three devisions. It has a coin pocket in the middle of the wallet. On either side of the pocket there is extra space to fit cards notes and receipts.

Dimensions: 11cm x 9.5cm x 1.5cm

Made with vegetable tanned leather from Italy. This is a high quality leather that feels great and gets better over time.

name: Tooth Pick Holders
description:
These toothpick holders are small enough to fit in the front and back pocket trouser pockets. They come various colours. 

Please contact us if you do not see a colour that you need.

name: Classic Leather Credit Card Wallet Grey/ Marroon
description:
Our Classic Leather Credit Card wallet is has six credit card pockets and two receipts pockets and a note section. 
This leather is thin and strong with a stylish patterned lining in the pockets.

name: Classic Leather Credit Card Wallet Green and Tan
description:
Our Classic Leather Credit Card wallet is has six credit card pockets and two receipts pockets and a note section. 
This leather wallet is smart and stylish with patterned lining.

name: Note Wallet
description:
Our Note Wallet is popular for men. 
It has a note compartment with two pockets for credit cards.

This is a must have for that fella who does not want anything too bulky.

name: Pouch Wallet
description:
Our pouch wallet is simple and made with thick leather. 

Its has one coin compartment and one credit card pocket (more cards cans be fitted as leather with stretch to accommodate more.

Note weathered leathers will get darker as they are being used.

name: Tux Wallet Two Fold Leather Wallet
description:
Our two fold leather wallet has two credit card pockets. These pockets can hold more than one card. 

As Leather can stretch to accommodate.

name: Zita Purse
description:
This Leather pouch style purse has two pockets, one is deep with a wide opening and on the side there is a flatter one. 

Black is sold out.

Dimensions: W 15cm x H 9.5cm x D 1.5cm

name: Leather Card Purse
description:
Our Leather Card purse is big enough to fit cards in. 
Simple one pocket for someone that does not want to carry too much around with them.

6 x 8 x 1 cm

name: Ipad Cover
description:
This Ipad cover comes in various colours. The Ipad cover fits both the Ipad 1 and 2 snug and safe. With of course accommodating Ipad smart cover.

The Ipad cover is made with vegetable tanned from Italy and is stamped with the Wolfram Lohr Logo and Handmade in England.

Please look at Ipad cover with straps for examples of colours.

They come in a lots of  colours and can be changed. Have ideas and don't see the colour you want? Then just contact us and we will glad to help.

With all natural products be carful in direct sunlight fading may occur.

name: Handmade Leather Spats
description:
Our spats come in one size and straps that fit under the shoe and fasten on top. They also have lace hooks on the side to fit on to the ankle.

They can be made in different colour schemes. Colour combining is one of our strengths and it will be left to Wolfram's discretion. Alternatively please contact us to discuss your leather stitching and lining preferences.

name: Gift Voucher 10
description:
This special gift can be bought for loved ones saving up for something special. We will log the information and when that special someone would like redeem there vouchers we will send special a code so that they can spend there vouchers however much they would like spend.

All you have to do is make sure you mention the name of the person receiving the vouchers.
